ground_truth.name: FinancialAnalysis.get_portfolio

args.portfolio: Current portfolio includes investments in stocks, bonds, and real estate.

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FileOperation.read_file', 'description': 'read file from disk', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'file_path', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The path of the file.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'text', 'description': 'the text of the file.'}]}, {'name': 'FileOperation.save_file', 'description': 'When all steps done, YOU MUST use save_file() to save the file', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'file_path', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The path where the file will be saved.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': 'the result of the execution'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.get_portfolio', 'description': 'Get the current portfolio of social security investments', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'portfolio', 'description': 'the current portfolio details'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.get_historical_performance', 'description': 'Get historical performance and market trends of each social security investment', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'portfolio', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The portfolio details.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'performance', 'description': 'the historical performance and market trends'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.calculate_potential_returns', 'description': 'Calculate the potential returns of each social security investment', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'performance', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The historical performance and market trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'returns', 'description': 'the calculated potential returns'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.generate_investment_strategy', 'description': 'Generate an investment strategy based on the potential returns', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'returns', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The calculated potential returns.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategy', 'description': 'the generated investment strategy'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
作为一名财务规划师，我需要为我的社会保障金投资制定财务规划。请首先获取我目前的社会保障金投资组合。然后，获取每个社会保障金的历史表现和市场趋势。接着，计算每个社会保障金的潜在回报。最后，提供一个社会保障金投资策略。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取当前的社会保障金投资组合
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
